pr_title: STORM-3634 validate numa ports contained in supervisor.slots.ports

timeline.bodyText: Lately, we added NUMA support, so if getNumaPorts is configured and not empty, numaPorts should be used otherwise it can default to slots_ports. Since we are providing more than one place to configure ports, I think it is implied that NUMA one is newer and should win if configured. No need to stop supervisor daemon.
timeline.author: kishorvpatil

replies.bodyText: To avoid user confusion, we should update Java Documentation on configuration suggesting that if numa_ports are configured they take precedence over slots.ports.
replies.author: kishorvpatil

replies.bodyText: That's also fine with me. But yes we need documentation on this, as long as it is clear to users/maintainers
replies.author: Ethanlm

replies.bodyText: Updated comment in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/STORM-3615 to address as part of the NUMA feature documentation.
replies.author: agresch

replies.bodyText: @kishorvpatil - updated to add numa ports to slots ports config.
replies.author: agresch
